thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com
thread.title: Katie

author: Katie
title: Katie
text: I purchased Mabel's Labels for my daughter's daycare items. A good friend used them for her son's belongings and told me they were great. She was right! I love the durability of the label - sippy cups can go in the dishwasher and they hold up without needing to be replaced. Additionally, the design options are really cute. I now recommend Maybel's Labels to all my friends that are parents.
